content.rendered:
Helabet Review.

Helabet Kenya is one of the many betting sites in Kenya that have been in existence for a while now. They offer a variety of sports betting options including virtual games.

Helabet at a glance.

Features – 8/10

Bonuses – 9/10

User Experience – 7/10

User Experience – 7/10

Summary.

Helabet is a new betting site that is known for its good odds and insane bonuses. One particular bonus option in question is the first time deposit bonus where you are able to get 100% of your stake  ksh 40,000.

OVERALL

7.8/10.

In-depth Review.

Soccer is the leading sport event which is followed by majority of Kenyans. Helabet dud their homework and came to the same conclusion. They then opted to offer multiple football sporting events that range from local football competitions to those played in the international level. This hassde it gain a huge customer base in Kenya. Helabet also offers pre-match analysis of matches and guides punters in how to go about placing bets on certain matches. This is quite useful as it saves the punter both time and money.

Homepage

Features.

Helabet is one of the leading sports betting sites in Kenya which features some of the best betting options out there. When it comes to virtual betting, helabet allows you to choose from one of the many games it offers. Some of the games offered include football, tennis, rally, cycling, horse racing and hounds. These virtual games are different from the real games in that, they take much less time to be completed and payout is usually instant. It is therefore important that when you choose a virtual game, you make sure that it is one you are good in and you stand a high chance of actually winning.

Helabet mobile version features a user-friendly web design which allows you to navigate your way around with so much ease. Customers usually like a betting site which makes it convenient for them to make bets and be able to follow them easily. Helsbet makes this possible and they even make it more interesting by allowing members to be able to use their livebet feature to be able to follow respective matches and place bets in them as well.

What is particularly interesting about their virtual games is the fact that you are able to get 100% welcome bonuses amounting to ksh 40,000. The total amount of withdrawal possible is the one set by the operator.

Learn more about superbet 247

Sports to bet on.

Football

Tennis

Basketball

Cricket

Boxing, MMA and other fighting and sport disciplines

Ice hockey

Track and field athletics

American football

Cycling

Darts

Formula 1, NASCAR, Motorcycling, Speedway and other motor sport disciplines

Golf

Rugby League and Rugby Union

Surfing

The Olympic games.

Betting on events that aren’t sport, for example Politics, Special bets, TV shows and movies

Pros.

Very affordable minimum amount to bet on

User-friendly website

Huge deposit bonus

Free bets

QuickBet functionality

Cash Out

Live betting

Deposit bonus

Filter by match starting time

Hela 5 multiplies your stake five times for winning live bets

Virtual betting

Free deposits

Variety of matches to bet on

Provision for foreign exchange

Decent website.

Cons.

No customer care

No jackpot

Casino available

SMS betting not available

Limited advertisement Support not working 24/7.

Helabet FAQ.

How do I deposit from mpesa to helabet?

Making deposits are quite easy. All you got to do is open your M-Pesa menu and enter Pay Bill 290007. Then you key in the amount you choose to deposit followed by your password. You will then get a confirmation message via SMS.

Know the Tricks and tips of winning

How to withdraw from helabet to mpesa.

Withdrawals from your account to your mpesa are quite simple. All you have to do is go to their website and log into your account. From here, you will click on “my bets” then proceed to click on “withdraw.” What is left to do is to simply let in the amount of money you wish to withdraw and wait. It is worth noting that these withdrawals can take up to a maximum of12 hours.  

What is the helabet customer care details?

Their customer care Phone number and other details are as follows:  +254700633633 Email:   support@helabet.co.ke
